name: Cashew Crusted Trout
author: RockChalk
summary: My wife and I had Cashew Crusted Trout on a vacation to San Diego. It was so delicious that we attempted to replicate the dish at home.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, or as needed
directions: Heat a flat griddle pan over medium heat
Mix panko, cashews, black pepper, salt, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
Whisk eggs and milk together in a separate bowl
Dust trout with flour until evenly coated
Dip floured trout in egg mixture, then press trout into cashew mixture until thoroughly coated
Melt butter and oil together in the hot griddle pan
Place trout, flesh-side down, into the pan and cook for 3 minutes
Flip and cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 3 minutes more
